Key Match Events: Ali Madan scored the winning goal for Bahrain in the 90+6' minute
Pre-Game Insights: Bahrain dominated the head-to-head record with three wins, one draw, and zero victories for Malaysia
Malaysia was going through a bad moment in the Asia Cup 2024 with zero points and a goal difference of -4
Bahrain had a bad performance in the Asia Cup 2024 with zero points and a goal difference of -2
Post-Match Reflections: Bahrain won 1-0 at home over Malaysia, the goal coming from Ali Madan at minute 90+6'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Jassim bin Hamad Stadium in the city of Rayan (Qatar)
The stadium has a capacity of approximately 15,000 spectators
Others: The refereeing team was led by Ahmed Abu Bakar Said Al Kaf
The match was broadcast on Fubo Sports Network, ViX, and VAVEL USA
